reviews.review:
Portal

Pros-

#1.Ok graphics but some this will be a con

#2.The computer enemy had very unique and interesting programing

#3.The portals are the best part of the game and a awesome creation

#4.The puzzles/levels get harder but not so hard I had to cheat or got angry with the game

#5.The funny things the computer enemy would say and the small machine gun bots



Cons-

#1.It's one of the shortest games that I have ever played

#2.I think the female character we play as looks weird.I would rather not look like her

#3.They could have added more options to the portal gun.One could launch you without you having to jump or another could be in a slower no gravity mode.There is plenty they could add to the gun to give more variety

#4.They could have added more different types of bot enemies


The Bottom Line -

It's a fun game and I would say it's worth $5 now.I liked that I didn't cheat and watch someone else show me how to beat it.I beat the entire game without any guidance.You do feel smarter as you beat it.

It's hard for me to compare it to another game.It is a puzzle action game more then a shooter.

Just buy it and give it a chance and portal 2 is fun too.
there is portals and shit and puzzles and lots of jokes

this game is fun but there are some flaws like you have to spam left click on buttons because the buttons are weird and don't realize that your pressing it also i'm stuck on a level because i got the cube stuck and can't respawn  another please fix this
Do I need to explain? It's a good classic.
muito bom jogo fas nos puxar pela cabeÃ§a e e muito satisftorio quando vc passa

Absolutely incredible game. This and Portal 2 definitely take the spot of my all time favorite games. Graphics show their age, but are pretty damn nice. Atmosphere is great, and the story is incredible. Very well put together, and very thought out. Amazing concept. Absolute necessity for everyone to play.
it was fun and intersting. fuck man. just let me recommend and not comment
Una obra de arte, junto con a su continuaciÃ³n.
good go threw portal and get cube
One of the best games I've ever played played it 5 times by now
It's Portal. A classic puzzle game that everyone knows and loves. Nothing else to say really.

Uno dei giochi piÃ¹ belli di sempre, che gira su qualsiasi PC, io la prima volta che l'ho giocato ero su un portatile con i3 del 2010, anche oggi non Ã¨ invecchiato di un giorno, gameplay originale, Ã¨ spiritoso e ti fa usare il cervello!
corto profundo perfecto si te gustan las breves y buenas historias deberias  jugarlo
i recommend this game its fun its over 10 years old and you shoot portals to complete test chambers

The first game I ever bought on Steam. A game that revolutionized the puzzle genre as we know it. If you haven't played this game, do it. It's a steal, even at full price. I don't even have to say anything else.
IT is an old but very VERY good game.

Portal is a great puzzle game that you must play. Its got clever level design and the only problem i've had with the game is that while moving between portals the camera didn't always do what i wanted it to do.
Portal also has achievements that are pretty hard to get and you'll probably need a guide for to beat (because sometimes the developers want you to exploit stuff).
I'd recommend this game to anyone really.
I always wanted to play this game and it deliffered!
The cake is NOT a lie

Extremly good game 10/10
would recommend to anyone at all ages
Very cool game mechanics and story! 9/10

A great puzzle game: a lot of interesting portal puzzles, and it doesn't have time to get bored.

This has a great story and is an amazing puzzle game. Its sequel, Portal 2 is also a great game, evolving the story and also being an amazing puzzle game

This game is great.
If you don't play the bonus levels.
Amazing physics that never get old. Very nice and smooth gameplay, highly recommended both portal 1 and portal 2
Muy bueno, es facil pero, buenardo
Simple e interesante historia, lo mas resaltante son los desafios de portal, no eh visto tal locura de niveles de alta dificultad en el que ingenio y astucia son tu unica salida.

Portal... All I want to say is, if you're in 2020 and you STILL haven't played portal, do it. Portal and Portal 2, just play it! I bought this game in 2018 and didn't know anything about it. It blew my mind. Even to this day, Portal and Portal 2 are one of my favourite games of all time. If you're someone who hasn't played these games, but is thinking about playing it, stop what you're doing, cancel everything for the next two or three days and play these games. You won't regret it.
I love Valve, I love this game, and I love the second one even more.  Highly recomend
Best puzzle game i have played
Classic, but Good. Main story is short. At least it was for me, still an all around good must play.
if you can only play two games in your life play this one and then portal 2
Si se te da bien la logica, terminas el juego en 2 horas
Awsome game got it done an hour
Lovable, funny, good time waster. Worth the purchase, both 1 and 2. 7/10
I liked it because the puzzles can be a challange and the humor is greate
An amazing puzzle game with simple yet challenging gameplay. The storyline is great, but the second one is even better.
